titles.title: Interagency Patent Coordination and Improvement Act of 2025
Interagency Patent Coordination and Improvement Act of 2025
Interagency Patent Coordination and Improvement Act of 2025

A bill to amend title 35, United States Code, to establish an interagency task force between the United States Patent and Trademark Office and the Food and Drug Administration for purposes of sharing information and providing technical assistance with respect to patents, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.
Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Grassley with amendments. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 41.

committee.name: Senate Judiciary
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation
